TopicTitle: [VIDEO] Late Evening Hop - A Spaceflight cinematic

Articles.Content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jUdDAx883dA



A cinematic video using soundtrack from "From the Earth to the Moon" and video from Kerbal Space Program with Audio from NASA.
Rest in peace, Alan Shepard and Gus Grissom -- America's Suborbital Astronauts.
The burn on re-entry was a nice touch. Kudos.
